intro: Stenandriopsis subdentata, commonly known as the narrow-lobed stenandriopsis, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves with finely serrated margins. It produces small, white to pink flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. The fruit is a small capsule that contains several seeds, typical of the Rubiaceae family.
